players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Bob is dead, so one of the three of us remaining is the mafioso. We need to be very careful with our vote today since with only 4 players total, eliminating the wrong person could lose us the game."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest Alice now before she eliminates one of us tonight."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest Alice now before she eliminates one of us tonight."
You: "Alice: I understand why Charlie is suspicious, but accusing me so quickly seems like a desperate move. We should consider that Diana might be the detective trying to protect herself."

Diana: "Charlie's immediate accusation of Alice without any evidence or reasoning is very suspicious. A villager would want to discuss and analyze, but Charlie jumped straight to accusations. I think Charlie is the mafioso trying to eliminate Alice quickly."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
